plot: Gino D'Acampo takes us on a tour of the land of his birth, Italy. As we visit each place he tells us why it is so special to him, shows us the sites and demonstrates different recipes from the area using local produce!
plot_en: Gino D'Acampo takes us on a tour of the land of his birth, Italy. As we visit each place he tells us why it is so special to him, shows us the sites and demonstrates different recipes from the area using local produce!
plot_es: Gino D'Acampo takes us on a tour of the land of his birth, Italy. As we visit each place he tells us why it is so special to him, shows us the sites and demonstrates different recipes from the area using local produce!
title: Gino's Italian Escape
